```{r}
# 1. Data Loading & Cleanin
crimes <- read_csv(
  "data/Crimes_-_2001_to_Present_20251020.csv",
col_types = cols(
  Longitude = col_character(),
  Latitude = col_character()
))

names(crimes) <- names(crimes) |>
  str_replace_all("\\s","_") |>
  str_to_lower()
```
